Class LCSArrayImpl

java.lang.Object
us.mn.state.dot.tms.server.BaseObjectImpl
us.mn.state.dot.tms.server.ControllerIoImpl
us.mn.state.dot.tms.server.DeviceImpl
us.mn.state.dot.tms.server.LCSArrayImpl
All Implemented Interfaces:
SonarObject, ControllerIO, Device, LCSArray, Storable
public class LCSArrayImpl extends DeviceImpl implements LCSArray
A Lane-Use Control Signal Array is a series of LCS devices across all lanes of a roadway corridor.
Author:
Douglas Lau

    • getIndicationsCurrent

      public Integer[] getIndicationsCurrent()
      Get the current lane-use indications.
      Specified by:
      getIndicationsCurrent in interface LCSArray
      Returns:
      Array of currently active indications, one for each lane. These are ordinal values of the LaneUseIndication enum. A null indicates the indication for that lane is unknown.
